item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Privacy Policy Software Play Store built the Software Play Store app as a Free app. This SERVICE is provided by Software Play Store at no cost and is intended for use as is. This page is used to inform visitors regarding my policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use my Service. If you choose to use my Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy.

item.title: Terms Of Use
item.description: TERMS OF USE Last updated September 25, 2020 AGREEMENT TO OUR LEGAL TERMS We are Software Play Store ("Company," “we,” “us,” “our”), a private software developer mainly develope android application in Sweden and a team in Japan as well. We operate the website https://mytripnavi.com/ (the “Site”), the mobile application Android App (the “App”), as well as any other related products and services that refer or link to these legal terms (the “Legal Terms”) (collectively, the “Services”).
